full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LTUNG BSHAGS KYI SGO NAS 'CHI BLU BYA TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES PHUNG PO GSUM @006B PA'I MDO LA RTEN PA'I 'CHI BLU BYA TSUL 'DI NI, SNGON CHAD HA CING GRAGS MI CHE YANG, ,DGE BA'I GSHES GNYEN ZHIG GIS CHOS BSGRIGS MTHONG PAS RKYEN BYAS BSAGS SBYANG GI GNAD TSANG PA 'DI LTA BUS KUN LA PHAN CHE BAR MTHONG NAS, ,SH'AKYA BTZUN PA ^ SHING BZA' SKYES MING 'DZIN PAS LHAG BSAM DAG PAS KUN NAS BSLANGS TE, MKHAS GRUB TSAD LDAN DU MAS MDZAD PA'I CHO GA LA GZHI BYAS TE, YAB RJE RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I GTAN SA SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING GI RANG GSHAG BDE CHEN CHOS KYI DGA' TSAL DU BRIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA SANG PO LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN 'BYUNG BAR GYUR CIG , ,,'DI BRIS DGE BAS BYANG CHUB SNYING PO 'BAR, ,BLA MA MCHOG GIS DGYES BZHIN RJES BZUNG STE, BKA' BZHIN SGRUB LA GCIG TU GZHOL PA YIS, ,'GRO KUN DON DU SANGS RGYAS MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,PAR 'DI SHING BZA' BLA BRANG DU BZHUGS,, ,,)
